OCD.name: ActiveCQ - Error Page Handler
OCD.description: Handles the resolution of the proper Error pages to display.

AD.name: Error page extension
AD.description: Examples: html, htm, xml, json. [Optional] [Default: html]

AD.name: Fallback error page name
AD.description: Error page name (not path) to use if a valid Error Code/Error Servlet Name cannpt be retrieved from the Request. [Required] [Default: 500]

AD.name: System error page
AD.description: Absolute path to system Error page resource to serve if no other more appropriate error pages can be found. Does not include extension. [Optional... but highly recommended]

AD.name: Error page paths
AD.description: List of valid inclusive content trees under which error pages may reside, along with the name of the the default error page for the content tree. Example: /content/geometrixx/en:errors [Optional]
